Posts.Content: juliejk wrote: I had a diagnostic mammogram and u/s last week which is leading to a core biopsy tomorrow morning.  I was told I have the choice of whether or not to have Valium for the biopsy.  I'm not big on painkillers but don't want to get half way through the procedure and wish I would've taken the Valium.  Thoughts? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Valium for biopsy? juliejk thatsvanity

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2012 10:25AM juliejk wrote: Off to my biopsy, with Valium.  Thanks, ladies, for all your wonderful wisdom :)
